name: SideSkills
tag_list: work, hire, sideskills, network, connections, trusted-network, manage-projects, make-payments
overview:
sideskills.com is the fastest growing social employment, career networking and eCommerce platform in the cloud for job seekers and employers. We turn eCommerce into meCommerce®, allowing job seekers the quickest way to get hired and a better way to market themselves, their services or products. For employers, Sideskill’s reduces the risk in hiring and offers the most efficient, cost effective access to global talent. Our unique community based architecture and powerful smart-search technology takes the risk out of employer and employee matchmaking. For more information, please visit http://www.sideskills.com.

What is sideskills? Job Seeker: sideskills is the fastest growing online social employment, career networking and eCommerce platform in the cloud where you can market yourself, your services and products- meCommerce®. This allows for the quickest way to get a one time, part time, full time job offer or sell your products based on all of YOUR skills.

Employer: sideskills is a unique online social employment, career networking and eCommerce platform in the cloud where employers can quickly, cost effectively and safely hire qualified candidates and global talent. sideskills reduces the risk in hiring or contracting services through powerful interactive networking, smart search technology and proprietary algorithms for employer and employee matchmaking, feedback (ratings/rankings) and secure payment process.

sideskills seeks to bring millions of people together everyday through its powerful online platform by a passionate community of individuals and small businesses. With our social media architecture, friends are turned into lead generators. sideskills also fills a massive need for the average job seeker and allows for the fastest way to get back in the work force and find the right position for you. Through our smart search technology, proprietary algorithms for employee and employer matchmaking and your PRESUME - social profile and interactive resume, there is no easier way to get hired.

A animated video showing users the simple process of working and finding work on SideSkills.com.
